Imagery Description: (a) Draped woman, holding wreath in r., mirror in 1., (a) nude youth bending forward over raised r. foot; white fillet top r.
Additional Notes: Found with the olpe 22449 and the squat lekythos 22443 (nos. 15Non Sepcified16 above); cf. with Mainz O . 29212 (no. 17) and the vases from C. Arcioni (1977), T. 271 (48455Non Sepcified6; 48460Non Sepcified2).
